race.name: Filthy 50
race.tagline: Minnesota fall gravel—50 miles of rolling terrain, 1,000 riders, and peak autumn colors.

climate.description: Early October: 40-60°F, 30% rain chance, fall conditions, peak autumn colors.

terrain.surface: 80% gravel, 20% dirt roads. Rolling terrain. Northern Minnesota lakes area. Fall foliage (October peak colors). Technical rating: 2/5.

biased_opinion.summary: Filthy 50 is Minnesota fall gravel—50 miles of rolling terrain, 1,000 riders, peak autumn colors (early October). Founded ~2010. 80% gravel, 20% dirt. Rolling but not technical (2/5). Northern Minnesota lakes area. 40-60°F fall conditions. If you want accessible fall gravel with scenery, this is it. If you want brutally hard or mega-distance, skip it. 50 miles manageable for most riders.
biased_opinion.bottom_line: Filthy 50 is Minnesota fall gravel. 50 miles, rolling terrain, fall colors. If you want accessible gravel with scenery, this is it. If you want mega-distance or brutal challenge, skip it. Regional favorite, affordable, scenic. October weather variable.

logistics.travel_summary: MSP airport 150 miles. Rental car needed. Northern Minnesota limited lodging—book early. Day-before packet pickup. Race early October.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. Post-race party.

course_description.character: 50 miles, 3,000 ft. 80% gravel, 20% dirt. Rolling Minnesota terrain. Fall foliage (October). Technical rating: 2/5.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: Minnesota Rolling Gravel
suffering_zones.description: Rolling terrain. Chunky gravel but not technical. Manageable.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: 35-40mm tires. Steady pace. 50mi manageable for most.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: October Fall Weather
suffering_zones.description: 40-60°F, 30% rain. Cold fall conditions. Layers critical.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Layers for 40-60°F. Rain gear. Fall weather variable.

course_description.signature_challenge: Minnesota fall colors + October cold. Manageable 50mi distance.

history.origin_story: Filthy 50 founded ~2010. Minnesota fall gravel. 50 miles, 1,000 riders. Northern Minnesota lakes area. Fall foliage. Regional favorite.
history.reputation: Minnesota regional favorite. Fall gravel, fall colors, accessible.
